jobscope.item: Responsible to develop a responsive web apps for Employee Training Record.
Responsible to conduct training assessment for PETRONAS Carigali employee.
Knowledge Transfer to the team in the area of Software Development.
Deployment of the web apps into Production environment and ensure the apps is secured.
Business continuity support and documentation.
Mentor & Lead software development project that involves various Stakeholder (public/internal).
Participate and organize UAT session with relevant stakeholders.
Ensure all the assigned web apps met Organization security standard and compliances.
Participate in a team/departmental/organization discussion to give a technical opinion and architecture advices.
Require to support existing web apps and also need to make sure the documentation is up-to-date for references.
Responsible to lead the Payment Team to deliver a Real-Time Payment Platform (RPP) for EPF.
Fully responsible to create a new framework for the team, KPI planning, and also strategic objectives.
Be the key-person for the stakeholder to connect and also responsible to present project progress to the top management (C-Levels) directly.
Vendor management for Tender process and also Stakeholder management to get input and comply to the Central Bank of Malaysia on implementing this solution.
Design and develop end-to-end software architecture and to be presented on Monthly Enterprise Architecture forum.
A full-stack software engineer that is responsible to maintain their existing products called TEMS Director (Fleet Management software).
Resonsible to create and improve the web apps Unit Testing using Karma.
Participate and contribute to Agile methodologies. Sometimes require to be Scrum Master if the current Scrum Master is unavailable.
Engage with the West Team in Sweden to get more information or discuss on certain products feature.
Responsible to migrate the existing on-premise web apps into cloud (Azure) platform.
Responsible to develop a web apps that help IT Infrastructure team to diagnose, troubleshoot, or view information on particular item in ExxonMobil.
Require to develop an automation scripts for the Internet Hosting team to automate their daily task.
Responsible to train junior developer on basic fundamental of software and network architecture.
Provide input and direction on feature planning.
Fully responsible to develop new documentation guideline using Atlassian software so others would follow the standard practice.
Responsible to develop or improve the current Legal, Tax, and Consolidation in BASF globally.
Require to master Legal and Tax business process globally since each country has its own law and regulations.
Translate the business process into technical products and always need to find a way to improve the technical process so that it is going to be easy to maintain.
Digital Transformation by 2025 is to have fully Data Intelligence and Software Intelligence driven to minimize maintenance.
Explore into Microsoft Low Code/No Code products, AI Builder, SAP products.
